SELECT a.test_num, a.test_date, a.prcs_ing_code, b.prcs_code, c.prod_name, b.prcs_amt, a.pass_amt, a.non_pass_amt FROM prod_quality a JOIN prcs_ing b ON a.prcs_ing_code = b.prcs_ing_code JOIN v_semi_all c ON b.prod_code = c.prod_code AND b.prcs_code = c.prcs_code
WHERE a.test_date IS NULL ORDER BY TEST_DATE DESC

SELECT a.test_num, a.test_date, a.prcs_ing_code, b.prcs_code, c.prod_name, b.prcs_amt, a.pass_amt, a.non_pass_amt FROM prod_quality a JOIN prcs_ing b ON a.prcs_ing_code = b.prcs_ing_code JOIN v_semi_all c ON b.prod_code = c.prod_code AND b.prcs_code = c.prcs_code
WHERE a.test_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY TEST_DATE DESC

SELECT A.TEST_NUM ,A.PRCS_ING_CODE ,B.TEST_NUM_INFO ,B.TEST_CODE ,B.PASS_VALUE ,B.TEST_RESULT ,B.PASS_YN ,B.EMP_CODE ,FIND_CDNM('0O', PASS_YN) AS PASS_YN2 ,FIND_EMP_NAME(EMP_CODE) AS EMP_NAME ,FIND_CDNM('TEST-TYPE', TEST_CODE) AS TEST_NAME FROM prod_quality A JOIN prod_quality_info B ON(a.test_num = b.test_num) WHERE a.test_num =#{testNum}

SELECT A.TEST_NUM ,A.TEST_DATE ,B.PRCS_ING_CODE ,B.PRCS_CODE ,B.PRCS_AMT ,A.PASS_AMT ,A.NON_PASS_AMT ,c.semi_yn
FROM prod_quality a
JOIN prcs_ing b ON (a.prcs_ing_code = b.prcs_ing_code)
JOIN prcs_manage c ON (b.prcs_code = c.prcs_code)
WHERE c.semi_yn = 'Y' AND test_date IS NOT NULL AND LOWER(A.TEST_NUM) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{testNum}) || '%' ORDER BY TEST_DATE DESC
